attributes.action: Change the National Anthem to "Barwick Green", theme from "The Archers"
attributes.additional_details:
To have the national anthem changed to "Barwick Green", the theme from the BBC Radio Four rural drama, "The Archers".

If you are not familiar with "Barwick Green" then please consult either of these YouTube videos:

Old recording:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wNEawM6vZf4

New recording:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XeIEovjOVdI
